timeline.body:
I think we can just say
```suggestion
      // Equivalent of "$ htpasswd -nbB username password".
```
There's no reason to use or consider `registry:2` at all. The image just happened to have `htpasswd` installed.
timeline.bodyHTML:

There's no reason to use or consider registry:2 at all. The image just happened to have htpasswd installed.
